content.detailedDescription:
I stepped out of my house to get some air at around 9:45pm and in the northern part of the sky i watched (and filmed) what appeared to be a drone performing acrobats. it was a fun spectacle and it actually got me slightly down as i thought to myself, 'fifteen years ago and this was would have been completely mind-blowing - now everything unexplainable in the sky is probably just a drone.'

after the object disappeared behind the buildings across the street and probably landed i went back inside for a moment to get a glass of water and then felt the urge to take one last look outside but the object had not returned.

then, right as i was going to retreat back indoors, i glanced straight upwards and just as i did, a large, black/dark grey triangle/boomerang shaped craft passed silently and swiftly directly over my head. it had no running lights but there was enough ambient light pollution to illuminate it from the ground that i was able to clearly make out the shape.

now i've been following black triangle stories for decades and i never thought i would see one, let alone right outside of the home in the middle of urban sprawl orange county. ironically, my father had a similar sighting many years ago in new york city except he saw several of these things as opposed to the one i saw.

i estimate the craft was about the size of a football field, flying between 500-1000ft off the deck and moving at about 200mph, traveling east to west. no lights and no noise but i was able to clearly observe it for about 4 seconds.
content.summary: A silent, unlit black triangle passed swiftly over my position outside my home in orange county, ca.

content.detailedDescription: We were driving south west on warren street, when my daughter took a picture out of her passenger window. she wanted to take the picture because the light was so bright coming from that side so she stuck her phone towards the window and snapped a picture. we quickly realize that that's not where the sunlight was coming from and when she looked at her phone she noticed the object i was floating to the right of us. before we got to that area we could see the area in which the object was floating and nothing was there from a distance again however once we got close the lights seem to be so break coming from that area she snapped a picture and she quickly looked at it. she noticed the object and showed it to us immediately. my daughter is 10 years old
content.summary: We were driving south west on warren street, when my daughter took a picture out of her passenger window because at the time it seemed like the sun was just so bright. so sweet. let me take a picture of it since we can't look that way object which was not

content.detailedDescription: after locking my telescope observatory i walked down the side of my home to check my plants for watering @ which time i looked skyward to check for rain when i saw an object that resembled a large piece of aluminium fluttering in the distance.I watched this object for 30 to 40sec before running inside to grab my camera(canon400d with 300mm zoom lense)& then running out the back door hopeing it would stay on the same heading,it did & i was able to find it pretty quickly again.I watched it move left,right,descend & ascend at will with no turning circle at all,just direct directional changes of up to 180deg at times with no speed loss before slowing at witch time i engaged the image stabilizer on the camera & took 4 shots,all within 10seconds,after the fourth images it changed direction by 180deg & ascended into the clouds,i wacthed that area of sky for the next 1.30hours with no joy, after witch time i went inside to check the images to find an object unlike anything i've ever seen or researched training to be a pilot in my younger years. im an astronomer & have not submitted these images till now because an astronomer may be seen as someone looking for aliens witch is not case,i'm a astrophotographer.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Watched object first in the west move quickly through to north east with multiple directional changes & high velocity before slowing (then i imaged)& ascending into clouds.

content.detailedDescription: We were spending the day at the teotihuacan pyramids in mexico city.  while walking to the pyramid of the sun my wife and step daughter climbed one of the small temples to our left side.  i stayed below with our baby in the stroller.  i snapped a picture of them with my iphone and didn't really examine it since we were probably going to take many more.  that night while back at the hotel i was going over the pictures and noticed an object in the sky.  i estimate the clouds were less than 2000 feet from the ground from experience as a private pilot.  when we got back home to arizona my wife zoomed the picture in on her computer.  i am attaching the picture and the zoomed in copy.
content.summary: Mexico city pyramids trip, ufo appears in picture, did not notice object until that night at hotel while looking at cell phone pictures we took

content.detailedDescription:
Riding my motorcycle down troy grade into kendrick idaho i noticed a bright orange orb which at first i thought was a star or planet in the west sky, relized that there shouldn't be a bright star or planet in that section of the sky, watched object while riding toward juliaetta when it morphed into two orbs leaving a brief rectangle shaped trail between the two orbs, noticed another same orange orb in the east sky just above the ridge, looked back at the original orb and it was back to one orb, rode through juliaetta, watched the first orb morph again into two orbs woth rectangular shaped trail between them, rode out of juliaetta and actually went under orb so at this time it was behind me
looked for orb in the east sky,didn't see it 
continued toward u.S, hiway 12 to return home.
content.summary: Orange stationary orbs

content.detailedDescription:
Saturday morning and i was at the dining room table doing work.There is a sofa between me and the flat screen. my daughter was sitting doing school work when this glowing silver orb.Had glowing vilot and blue lights moving around it, no noise .Went down the wall, then went behinh the sofa.This point l was yelling at the daughter to lean over the sofa and to look at the object.She was scared and buried he face into a pillow . when it got to the west 2all it turned and folling the wall it came towards me, got to the wall, turned and passed behind me then turned an went into the kitchen, gone.
.
content.summary: Flew through my living room.Then went behind me in a seated chair then moved into the kitchen and disappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
After closing my telescope observatory i looked skyward to see an object that looked aluminiun like fluttering & moving very quickly fro my west & after 30 to 40sec i ran inside to grab my camera[canon 400d with 300mm zoom lens].After thinking were it might go i ran out the back of my home to try & find it again & did,after watching it ascend & descend,move left ,right with no turning circle at all,just direct turns of up to 180 deg at times it slowed at witch time i took 4 images before it ascended into a cloud ,after watching this area of sky for 1.30hours with no joy i went in side to check the images & 'wow'.
    these r those.     zzzoooooommmmmm   iiiinnnnnn
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Watch object move quickly fron west through to north east after moveing left,right ,vertical & descending before stopping & then i imaged it,4 shots.

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
A gray ball shaped object with wings was flying to the south. i  noticed a white/aluminum tint could be seen from the ground at the flite library at ferris state university.

1. where were you and what were you doing at the time?

i was standing outside smoking  cigarette and talking to a person when i was looking at the moon and noticed the object flying under the moonlight. 
2. what made you first notice the object?

i was observing the moon. 

3. what did you think the object was when you first noticed it?

i thought it might have been a bird, but there are no birds out at this time of night an it was to high to be a bird. birds also do not reflect moonlight off there wings. it was moving to precise to be a bird and was to high to be a drone. 

4. describe the object and its actions and motions in detail.

round, mirror and ball shaped. it was a reflective metallic color. 
it moved at the same altitude, but descended towards the south east at a very rapids pace. 

5. describe your feelings, reactions and actions, during and after sighting the object.

stunned. 

6. how did you lose sight of the object?
 it went behind a cloud or was no longer reflecting light off of it.
content.summary: A gray ball shaped object with wings was flying to the south.

content.detailedDescription: My girlfriend and i.Were driving she pointed out a light we had been seeing at the time it seemed to be observing us.Multiple.Times.At night. the light followed us a couple miles changed course and hoovers above the rd.We seemed to black out.Our vehicle left the rd and next thing we remember we were returning to the rd.We stopped about a mile later to cheek for damage.Two lights began to hover above us for a.M. couple mins then left.
content.summary: My girlfriend and i were driving home around 530 am she noticed a light we had observed numerous times at the time. it seemed to be following us, changed course and stopped above the rd. as we approached we blacked out vehicle left the rd then returned

content.detailedDescription:
United states, october 21, 2015 in north new jersey. i went outside at 9pm est to get my cat to bring inside, who was stubbornly at the curb of street. 

i was facing east and a bright white object moving across the sky appeared from the east horizon. almost 90 degrees from where i stood. i watched it move across the sky for about 8 seconds until it disappeared over the west horizon. it was a steady bright white, i could not recognize any shape to the object, but it remained as a large twinkle. yet, it was not twinkling, there was no pulsating light, just a steady bright light. 

it had no changes in size or color, and an unchanging straight line pace. at first sight i expected it was part of the orionids meteor shower happening tonight, but it was larger than the usual meteors i see during showers. it had no tail, or trail, it moved a little less fast than a meteor. actually i'm not sure about speed in that aspect, because i've seen fast and slow meteors, and large and small meteors. this was different, it was something i've never seen before.

while watching, i kept my eyes fixed on it, i felt in awe, comfortable, and i wanted to follow it. my cat did not care, he plopped into the grass, rolled around a bit, walked around, nothing unusual. after sighting it, i looked up to the north to spot an airplane. the previous light object i saw didn't look like an airplane, i couldn't make out it's shape, it seemed pretty far, larger,  and moved faster than any airplane i've ever seen at very long distance. 

i have no footage, or photos, and my cell phone was in the house during the experience. i plan on heading out later to see some of the meteor shower and would find it interesting to search online if anyone else had also witnessed this light object in the sky.
content.summary: North new jersey 9pm(est) bright light object east to west in night sky

content.detailedDescription:
From la riviera dr(between howe ave and watt ave), sacramento ca looking up at the north sky i noticed a large reddish orange light bigger than any stars i have ever seen.  this is 3 am in the morning i went outside for a smoke.  i was wide awake at this time. the object maybe stayed stationary for about 30 seconds to 1 minute when i became more aware.  then it started to drift toward ne slowly for 2 or 3 seconds before it accelerated in a blinding speed.  that morning the sky was clear with few widely scattered clouds in the sky.  it flew over the closest cloud when it came out i was able to continue tracking it then before it flew into or over the second cloud it made a sharp left turn.

2 days later i googled earth wondering what this craft may be snooping at 3 am in the morning.  well, my best guess is from the the location i have described up above you clicked north with the satellite view you will see the former mcclellan afb, which now is a civilian airport.  the airstrip is the biggest man made object you can see from the sky in this area. 

i am 60 years old and this is my very first ufo sighting experience. i never feel any danger from it, but, never the less it is still feel a little spooky but mostly fascinated by it.
content.summary: Reddish orange light about 10-15 times the size of the north star

content.detailedDescription: It was about an hour past sunset. i went out to my truck to grab my wallet and on my way back into the house i looked up at the big dipper. i often look for the big dipper for navigation at times and in general just to observe its seasonal location as it rotates around the north pole. on clear nights i will briefly observe the night sky as the area i live offers a near horizon to horizon view. right in the middle of the big dipper was a bright light. it was obviously out of place from what i would normally see. the light was stationary for about 20 seconds. then to the northeast a second light caught my attention as it flashed very brightly toward the southwest. at this time the 1st object began to slowly move in the direction of the 2nd object. when i looked back toward the northeast i could no longer see the 2nd object. once the first object reached the general area where the 2nd object flashed it disappeared from my view. i attempted to take video of the moving light, using another house as a reference point so the movement was visible. for some reason both videos cut out only a few seconds in.
content.summary: A bright light appeared north in the big dipper. a 2nd light to the northeast pulsed brightly. the 1st light then moved to the 2nd

content.detailedDescription:
Object was missle shaped , extremely fast to the point you only knew you saw it. 
it was black with lights that sequenced around it of different colors , as large as an airplanes landing lights but of green , red , yellow. 
flew 40 or so feet directly over house and as large or larger than a school bus. 
there was sound on approach and no sound when even with our position and sound after it passed. people in the house heard nothing but it was as loud as a jet at 40 feet off the ground to my friend and i. 
we were kids in the eighth grade playing touch football on the lawn. we both compared what we saw and it was the same. almost couldn't believe we saw it. 
mother in the house heard nor saw anything. 
 i'm 63 years old now and my friend is the same age and we still agree on it. 
he is an airforce crew chief retired and i am a retired electrician. 
 i have never mentioned this to anyone other than my mother and my friend before today.
content.summary: Missle shape but black with large lights. very , very , fast.

content.detailedDescription:
On august 2 2014 i had a close encounter of some kind, i was not taken nor did i see any entity…but was simply “shown” that “they” exist.

my experience was as follows and this is what i remember very clearly & distinctively;
o	we were at a friend “camp” north of president, pa on the upper allegheny river, very remote, there were 10 of us, standing around a huge bonfire drinking and talking.

o	it was like time had stopped, through the smoke of the huge bonfire i could see a craft above, very close to me/us, it was blinking a light at me…i say “me” because i could feel, sense it was communicating to me directly. it was like i was in a trance and i looked away it seemed in very slow motion and then looked back and it was there doing it again. my surroundings, friends were motionless, i could see the fire burning and the smoke from the fire moving upwards but it was like everything was frozen for a while so i could see them. there was no message per say it was like “hey we exist” and then they were gone.

immediately after the event i knew it happened but didn’t say anything to anyone it seemed like my memory of this encounter was delayed or blocked until i woke up the next morning. but then it was time to drive 6 hours back home after being up at camp for a week. ever since that day of august 2, 2014 i think of see/envision this encounter every single day in my mind it’s like it was tattooed into my memory so explicit, exact it’s like it happened just minutes ago. i can visualize the craft perfectly but i cannot draw it and have tried many times, it was a design i have never seen before and i looked up online many hundreds of ufo drawings. the craft i saw was multi-sided, very irregular, between an octahedron and an icosahedron shaped object, opaque in color flashing simply a white rectangular light at me that was tilted at an angle left to right. it was not like any ufo drawing i have seen on internet searches. it doesn’t haunt me as so much as i have so many questions. i wasn’t scared and don’t remember any communication at all – i am scheduled for a regression next month in november as i want to know more especially since i hear “another encounter” very similar to mine above from a notable scientist i know. 

my question have any others had a similar story to mine?

one other point, i am a very successful consultant to ceo's and b.O.D.'s so i'm not a wacko, although i've always been a "believer" i would like to know why i was contacted and or any info at all...Thanks
content.summary: Everything around me became frozen in time, except the fire and smoke continued, i could see it and it was blinking at me.

content.detailedDescription:
After closing my telescope observatory i walked west down the side of my home to check on my plants & then looked skyward as i do being an astronomer to see a light what looked like a large piece of aluminium fluttering,after watching this object for 30 to 40sec i realized this didn't look normal in any regard to aircraft & ran inside to grab my camera[400d canon].This object was moving very quickly & i thought if it was still following in the same heading i could run out the back of my home & then try to find it again,& i did after some searching.I watched this craft move left ,right,vertical, horizontal with no turning ark at all, it just turned at times at a 100 degree turn angle & no speed degradation at all until it slowed with its turns at which time i engaged the image stabilizer of the camera & snapped off 4 images.After the fourth image i watch this object turn 180 deg & ascend into the cloud at which time i watched that cloud & area of sky for the next 1.30mins with no joy.I have not submitted these images or story till know because being an astronomer can sometimes show me to be an astronomer looking for aliens which doesn't help my career,but these images speek for them selves.
  
 these are those.        ''zoooommmm innnnn''
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Followed this object from west through to north east after multiple direction & velocity changes,object slowed at witch time i took 4 images.After

content.detailedDescription: I had a video i wanted to submit but im not so good with computers heheheh. hopfully someone can come to analyze me as well as be informational .I am also seeking information about an entity as well as if people have had simillar dreams, entity sightings.I did take a video but unable to upload from my phone.Please contact me.
content.summary: Orbs of light from a distance i witness as well as one directly over my house changing lights dramaticaly i have also witnessed an entity.

content.detailedDescription:
1. i was driving on highway 46 heading west when i saw six glowing orange objects ahead.  

2. they were in a group above the highway ahead of where i was going and they moved quickly, at times, in unison, which caught my attention.

3. i first thought it could be airplanes, but then i saw that they were larger than that and moving in odd directions, all together.  having grown up in seattle, i was used to seeing planes every two minutes go overhead, and these were definitely not planes of any kind, including military, at least the kinds we know of publicly.

4. i pulled off the road into a parking lot to watch them.  they maintained equal distance from each other.  they were stationary at times, then would quickly move sideways or at an angle, only to hover once again.  they quickly left sw out of sight after about 4 minutes.  i had enough time to take pictures and i am still looking for the pictures as i meant to report this last year, but have been swamped.  however, i didn't want to let this go unreported.  my kids (ages 11 and 15 at the time) had time to see them, as well.

5. i was shocked, having never witnessed anything like this before, and a little nervous about what i was seeing, since then, perhaps, these could be real after all of these years hearing about them.  after, i was and am still in shock at what i saw and have been wondering what they were.

6. they quickly left sw out of sight, all together.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: My sons and i witnessed six glowing orange objects moving quickly in the sky.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home toward the east when i noticed several bright orange-yellow balls of light in the sky. i lost track of them while driving but they reappeared. at one point there would only be one light and then more would appear. it was hard to judge how many there were but i know at one point there were three in a straight line. by the time i got home they had stopped but i told my daughter about them. she went outside to take recycle out and saw the same kind of lights toward the east. we then sat outside on our porch to watch for them. they never were bright again but we did see star like lights that would appear and disappear and we could see them actual move. at one point one of them looked like it just dropped. there was a jet at this point that was heading their direction.
content.summary: Bright orange/yellow balls of light in sky

content.detailedDescription:
6th june 2012.2.37 pm. clear skies, high wispy clouds. at home in london with family watching england play foot ball ( i think)i walked down the road to the local chip shop and noticed a black object in the air just hovering. looked like a man with something on. probably about as high as a high rise building (possibly a bit higher)watched it for a while and was very puzzled. not seen anything like it before. thought it might have been a collection of balloons playing tricks with my eye but it was just sitting there, wind was not moving it. it looked controlled. any way i carried on to the chip shop with my girlfriend all the way saying that thing is weird ect.On the way back about twenty minuets later it was still there! just had move about 50ft in the sky from my view point and referencing of the building it was above. couldn't believe it was still there!!I got back to my girlfriends place on the fourth floor and looked out the back doors and got a clearer sighting of it. everyone was watching the football and i was showing them the thing in the sky, everyone was like "what is that!!" so i took my 14 meg pixel camera with a small zoom and zoomed in and started to recorded. also i noticed that there was a apache type looking helicopter flying very low just above the buildings in what seemed like a circle around it!! now i live in central london and have never seen any helicopter fly this low let alone a military one. it had the infrared nose one the front of it or what ever its called. so year i filmed it and thought it was very strange. i used to read world aircraft magazine and have seen some of the drones that were around at that time but im convinced it wasn't a drone, plus why would they have one over central london? 

i don't want to upload the video to the public until ive edited the sound because i sound like a jackass - if mufon wants it they can contact me.
content.summary: Black object. looked like a man in the sky. hovering and slowly drifting.Apachy helicopter flying around it very low

content.detailedDescription: I got up early as the sun was rising and took a couple photos of the horizon. did not notice anything in the sky. i noticed it in the picture later. odd thing was that it appears to be the same shape as the one i saw over 29 years ago with a friend when i was in college. it appeared to be square. yet, the one years ago that i saw was much clearer and right over our heads. this one was distant and seen only in the photo i took.
content.summary: I've seen one before several years ago with a friend. this one i did not see with my eyes but after i took the picture, i saw it in the picture. odd that it was the same shape as the one i saw when i was in college over 20 years ago.

content.detailedDescription:
Driving home from work.  trying to focus on breath.  looked up in the sky for no reason, noticed after i had ducked my head to see past roof of car (i'm 74" tall).  size and altitude made me think possible aircraft, especially since bwi, wash. nat. and andrews afb all have potential flight patterns above.  i noticed the vibrant reflective properties, and the size and speed made me think that something at that altitude would stall.  i noticed what seemed to be a reflection from the sun at only and angle a circular shape could produce, and then total disappearance before my eyes.  nothing blocked my view, and the craft wasn't going fast enough to have sped away from my field of view (again, almost stall speed).  

i am in so much disbelief and play devil's advocate in any situation where a ufo may have been a potentiality.  disbelief plagues any thought i had previously of a potential ufo.  this was no potentiality.  usap or otherwise, this wasn't your normal aircraft.
content.summary: Silver / chrome reflective, orb / circular / oval shaped.

content.detailedDescription: It was around 9:am on august 6th as i was looking out the window i could see way off in the distance through the clouds red and white blinking lights of another plane flying in the distance. i watched it for several minutes as it flew towards my plane and eventually flew under us. as i was watching the other plane i saw a ufo. it was a dome shaped object yellow gold in color. compared to the size of the lights on the plane it had to be 3 quarters the size of the plane. whatever it was it was fling perpendicular to my plane and moving at an astonishing speed. it had to have been moving more than a thousand miles and hour because as i watched it move in less than 3 seconds it moved the distance of 3 windows of my plane. the sky was clear and sunny that day.
content.summary: Was flying from las vegas to baltimore

content.detailedDescription: It was dusk, nearly completely dark out, i was walking from the back of my property to my house. there were no stars in the sky yet. i looked up towards the east, and out of the thin air i saw a light appear, what i first figured was a plane, as the light was way to bright and large to be a star. then i stopped walking and realized the light was not moving or blinking at all, so, it was not a plane then. the one yellow/orange light either split into three (forming a straight line) or it like.. tilted very abruptly, showing another angle that had the three lights. then (to me, was was maybe a half inch from the 3 lights) a fourth yellow/orange light appeared. forming a triangle. it stayed there unwavering in anyway for maybe 15 seconds then completely disappeared, as if the lights had simply been switched off. i could not see anything in between the lights (as in nothing connecting them) its as if they were exterior lights on a completely invisible flying craft of sorts. i stood out there for another 15 minutes with out moving and hardly blinking, but saw nothing else.
content.summary: Lights that appeared then disappeared in thin air

content.detailedDescription: Apear in horizont like an invisible shadon, some times moving for seconds the camuflages going dawn and you see liths and small windows and you can ear the beep coming from the space ship, all event during 1h: 8 min. i take a picture and make a small film.
content.summary: Like a big disck and invisible and visible same times i see many, small windows

content.detailedDescription:
Filled out at mufon hq with witness on the phone, by field investigator l. flechtner 18809 on 10/21/2015
----------------------------------------------------------------------
looking out my window at 3:30 to 4am sunday night i noticed a dark silver black saucer hovering over my back yard about 50' away. four or five aliens came out of the saucer and climbed on top of the saucer. the aliens were medium sized, darkish, and about the size of a 13 year old boy and had large eyes. the saucer had green lights on the bottom. after four hours the saucer ascended toward the south and disappeared. my window faces south and is on the first story. the craft was tree top high.
content.summary: Looking out my window at 4am sunday night i noticed a dark silver black saucer hovering over my back yard

content.detailedDescription: At my home on silver creek road,saucon valley.Standing on mt porach looking out over land scape.About 9pm caught out the corner of my eye some objects.8 passed about 1mile in front of me.Over farm land,by the saucon valley pipeline.4 red in front followed by 4 white. guess about 1 mile apart.White chasing red objects.Red went over the tree line.Then white.Saw many flashes.Then white objects fly back over same track but in upward 80 degree angle,very fast.I mean so fast took seconds to disapear.At the time i was 15 years old.In 1968.Now im 62.Tried to tell local cops but they did not bother.I know even then the diff. between chopper,planes,ballons.No electrical,clear stary night.Live in wooded area at that time.Way off main roads by 6 miles. this the first time writting this down. no pics.To fast.
content.summary: 4 red and 4 white ovals white chased red.

content.detailedDescription: I took my dogs outside about 7-8 pm on february 24th,as i walked to the back of my apartment complex toward the lake (sw direction) i noticed a bright object in the sky. i continued to watch the object, i noticed it had quick movement and then hovered, so i began to record with my iphone as i zoomed in with the phone i noticed it had a solid core center with a flickering colored halo around it. the object continued to hover moving slowly, then the object seemed to change shape slightly. i knew i was looking at something i've never seen before. moments later it just disappeared.
content.summary: Unknown object spotted in sarasota florida

content.detailedDescription: The entire shape as described above continued to rotate and stay in the area for several hours
content.summary: Huge rotating oval made of smaller ovals each rotating independently of main shape which also rotated

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
Filled out at mufon hq on the phone with witness, by field investigator l. flechtner 18809 on 10/21/2015
-------------------------------------------------------------------------
on october 10, 2015 at 4 am witness looked out window and saw a  blue ball of light zig-zagging, wiggling in the sky. ran out with his video camera and took 3 minutes of film. the next night he saw it again at about the same time. it was flying at 2,000, lower than an airplane. blue ball of light with rays around it. no propellers, no wings, no sound. defied gravity. no wind. almost looked translucent.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Looked out the window and saw blue ball of light

content.detailedDescription: I was in bed sleeping i was 7 years old in 1964,my bed was at window on the farm,i woke and was stareing at the stars when i seen this bright dot going fast then it stopped,and then just took  off in different direction,after few mins two objects just appeared they were round shape with coloured lights,they would disappear then appear again this was going on for good 10mins,it was clear night no wind and all the stars were out no moon,mybe i was lucky to witness this because i woke, and my window was faceing the stars.Been bugging me for years im 58 now and can picture that night night quiet well.It seened they were just sitting there playing with there lights testing disappearing and appearing.Then they just did not appear again didn't see them fly away.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Was like small bright star  that disapeared then followed buy two massive round ships with lights
